meanings.definition: A fellow member of a profession or organization.
meanings.sent1: In our team meeting, my confreres shared their ideas for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent2: She has been working closely with her confreres in the legal department.
meanings.sent3: The confreres in the science club always have the coolest experiments to show.
meanings.sent4: As confreres in the art world, they painted the town with their creativity.
meanings.sent5: The confreres in the choir harmonized beautifully during the performance.

meanings.sent1: My confreres at the office helped me with the difficult task.
meanings.sent2: He considered her his closest confrere in the army.
meanings.sent3: The confreres in the book club always recommend the best reads.
meanings.sent4: Their bond as confreres in battle was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The confreres in the volunteer group worked tirelessly to help the community.
